contextId.information: This question shows how amazed they were about the beast. AT: "No one is as powerful as the beast!" (ULB) (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]])
The angel used this question to gently scold John. AT: "You should not be astonished!" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]])
This question shows the people the importance of the city of Babylon. AT: "No other city is like the great city, Babylon" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]])
contextId.quote: What city is like the great city?
